title: Can we pause or stop in the middle of an Ayah while reading or listening to Quran? assim al hakeem
transcript: man from india so is it permissible by listening to in audio to pause before the ayah is completed it is inappropriate but it's permissible if the ayah is ayatul kursi and you're listening to the audio and you stop it you haven't done a sin but this is inappropriate it's best that you let the ayah finish or at least the phrase where the meaning is complete is finished and allah knows best you
